Achievements.Title: Agonizing Aquamentus

Achievements.Description: [Z1] Defeat any Manhandla using only the Wooden or White Sword without getting hit 3 times

Achievements.Title: Grounding Gleeok
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Defeat any Gleeok without using the Magical Sword, entering the bottom two rows, or getting hit 3 times
Achievements.Author: wolfman2000

Achievements.Title: Disturbing Digdogger
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Defeat any Digdogger that spawns three children using only recorders and swords, and without getting hit twice
Achievements.Author: wolfman2000

Achievements.Title: Gouging Gohma
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Defeat any gohma while staying on the bottom two rows and firing as few shots as possible

Achievements.Title: Pulverizing Patra
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Defeat any Patra in the game without taking damage

Achievements.Title: Gutting Ganon
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Deliver the coup de grace to Ganon within 45 seconds
Achievements.Author: wolfman2000

Achievements.Title: Prepared For Anything
Achievements.Description: [Z1] Beat the game in the 1st quest with all heart containers, items, & capacities upgraded to their max
